FuncDef:
The radius-server group command sets a RADIUS server group for the current domain.
The undo radius-server group command deletes the server group specified for the domain.
By default, no RADIUS server group is bound to an AAA domain.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates the name of a RADIUS server group.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 characters, including characters A to Z and a to z (case-sensitive), numerals (0 to 9), punctuation mark (.), dash (-), and underline (_).

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Before specifying the server group, make sure that the RADIUS server group must exist.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
